row.process:
:SET &command# = 'java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#dm-tool.jar rm SetDynamicProperty -u "&UC4RB_RM_HOST#" ' :SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#,'-un "&UC4RB_RM_USERNAME#" -p "&UC4RB_RM_PASSWORD#" ') :SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#,'-on "&UC4RB_RM_OBJ_NAME#" -n "&UC4RB_RM_NAME#" ') :SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#,'-v "&UC4RB_RM_VALUE#" -vt "&UC4RB_RM_VALUE_TYPE#" ') :SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#,'-pt "&UC4RB_RM_TYPE#" ')
:IF &UC4RB_RM_OBJ_TYPE# <> "" : SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#, '-ot "&UC4RB_RM_OBJ_TYPE#" ') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_RM_NAMESPACE# <> "" : SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#, '-ns "&UC4RB_RM_NAMESPACE#" ') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_RM_HIGHLIGHTED# = "YES" : SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#, '-h ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_RM_FAIL_EXISTS# = "YES" : SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#, '-fe ') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_RM_FAIL_DIFFERS# = "YES" : SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#, '-fd ') :ENDIF
&command#
